data.name: Centric Explorer (Glow in the) Dark Theme
data.description: Clean Dark Theme for the Centric Explorer with blue outlines.

data.name: MAIL.COM - NO ADS + COLORS
data.description:
- Hides MAIL.COM ads sidebar
- Dark Mode (Customizable main colors)

data.name: ToyHou.se Black Navigation and Footer
data.description: Changes ToyHouse's navigation bar and footer background to black. Works on all TH themes. Navigation link colours are changed to off-white and grey on hover. Footer link colours are unchanged and match your current TH theme. Premium is not required! Questions? Issues with the style? Send me a message at 'NoxAmira' on TH. https://toyhou.se/NoxAmira Feel free to edit and distribute your own version.

data.name: Yahooニュース サイドペイン非表示
data.description: Yahooニュース サイドペイン、Javaスクリプトで表示される挿入掲示版、その他広告フレーム、転送量を増加させる画像類 非表示

data.name: Microsoft Sticky Notes - Dark Mode
data.description:
Makes the entire sticky notes website dark.*

*(no longer, now it only themes the part not already themed)
If you want the full dark theme, just get the Tampermonkey script that enables it => https://github.com/TheAlienDrew/Tampermonkey-Scripts/raw/master/Microsoft/Sticky-Notes-Dark-Mode.user.js

data.name: Soundcloud Pitch Black
data.description: Soundcloud in dark :) For the nice font in the screenshot download & install this font: Champagne & Limousines - For even more black & white experience you can additionally install Soundcloud Grayscale --- Check out my other "Dark" styles: ₪ Google ₪ Discogs ₪ TabletPCReview & NotebookReview Forum ₪ Computerbase ₪ Global dark style ₪ and more...

data.description: Supprime la fenêtre modale demandant de noter des films afin d'activer les recommandations personnalisées.

data.name: 【Aug 4 Updated】Dribbble Dark Mode
data.description: Dribbble Dark Mode Dribbble Dark Mode gives Dribbble a darker look for a better viewing experience and makes it easier to focus on the shots you're watching. Features: - Dark Mode - Support the brand new dribbble design - Colorful style theme - Block Ads - Stay updated until Dribbble launches the official dark mode. Note: Please feel free to tell me if anything isn't properly, the problem will soon be resolved.

data.name: Custom Discord
data.description:
HOW TO INSTALL FOR DESKTOP CLIENT: 
Simplified Tutorial (PC and Mac):
https://imgur.com/a/i38IVzb
Advanced Tutorial (PC):
https://imgur.com/a/bYBErUC

Currently only support for dark mode.

NOTE: If wallpaper does not work, try to use a discord attachment link as the URL for your wallpaper

Features:
Cleaner and better design
Easily customizable
Desktop support

Check out my other styles:
https://userstyles.org/users/812884

DISCORD:
Join my Discord server to get notifications when a new update has been released, get direct support from me and others, and it is generally faster than userstyles to get in touch with me : https://discord.gg/Emv2rtk

Theme by Zhou Yahui
